{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wireless miniPCIe adapter |caption2 = 802.11n 5GHz MIMO 2T2R 300Mbps |pp = http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wle200n5-23/ |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLE200N5-23-ESD |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLE200N5 |submodelappend = |submodel = -23-ESD |revision = 8A0000 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = |wlclass = A300 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (oversized) |vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002a |subvendor_id = 168c |subdevice_id = 3099 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = XQ8WLE200N5-23ESD |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 04:F0:21 |chip1 = Atheros;AR9280; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL, MMCX |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = a/n |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{CompexMailKimp}} Per '''Compex''''s product page, the 8B0000 model uses MMCX connectors. :This is a 5GHz only card. === Features === * Atheros AR9280 (XSPAN family) chipset * 5GHz 802.11n compliant and backward compatible with 802.11a * 5GHz Single-band MIMO 2x2 spatial multiplexing technique * Maximum 23dBm output (per chain), 26dBm (aggregate) * Built-in ESD Protection with ESD/EMP Immunity Threshold: 15KeV === Ordering Configuration === 
Item Code 	 	Chipset Card Information
WLE200N5-23ESD 8A0000 	AR9280 	2x2 802.11an PCIe mini card
WLE200N5-23ESD 8B0000 	AR9280 	2x2 802.11an PCIe mini card
